modName: Molag Bals Temptress Gift - Evil Beauties of Skyrim
summary: Tired of being a good girl? Ready to walk the paths of Skyrim as the she-wolf among the sheep? Then go no further and check out my new Temptress Bad Girls. They really may fit your taste...
descriptionHtml:
About this mod

Tired of being a good girl? Ready to walk the paths of Skyrim as the she-wolf among the sheep? Then go no further and check out my new Temptress Bad Girls. They really may fit your taste...

This mod is for everybody out there who shares my love of beautiful females within Bethesda\'s gaming masterpiece Skyrim. This time I take care of the evil side of this wonderful game and I decided to create this mod to give everybody the opportunity to play through your Skyrim adventure with one of my characters to have something beautiful to look at which makes this game in my eyes even more enjoyable. If you like my characters please endorse :-).


About your character

I start this mod with three gorgeous young ladies of evil beauty but there are more to come.

Anwen

Anwen has been fascinated by the dark and mysterious persons creatures who walk the same earth as the ordinary people of Morthal where she grew up as an orphan, hardly noticed until they come upon them. Maybe she will become one of these...

Lady Vaadia ( requires Dawnguard )

Lady Vaadia has been born as a Vampire of true blood - a Daughter of Coldharbour - but after she had been captured by a powerful necromancer and his servants, she has lost all of her Vampiric powers, since the necromancer found a way to banish them into a soul gem for his own purpose. One day she managed to escape their hold and now she is looking to re-gain her former power which will require the help of another true blooded Vampire Lord...

Erana

Erana has been captured by a band of ravaging soldiers as a teenager, who enslaved and tortured her in their little camp in the snowy mountains near Winterhold. One day a captain showed up with his lifeguard and sentenced the soldiers to death for their ruthless and evil behaviour. He offered Erana his help, but after the nameless cruelties she had experienced before, she ran away from her saviour into the wilderness. Having abandoned all mercy and conscience from her bleeding heart her only purpose is to gain power and wealth, no matter who will have to die or suffer from her hand...


Required Mods

Our evil young ladies will need some help to achieve the climax of their beauty ( in the following load order ):

The fabulous ApachiiSkyHair mod by apachii AND her optional file with 10 new and stunning hairstyles.
- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

The gorgeous Temptress race mod by Psychosis and Brokefoot.
- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717

The fabulous The Eyes of Beauty mod by Gabriel Mailhot. Be sure to use the latest update!
- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Dawnguard ( Lady Vaadia only!! )

Now our Hotties are ready to go. The mods listed above are highly stable and should work without any conflicts.


Installation :

Just copy the mod file into your Skyrim Savegame data folder, start your game and load the \"Anwen/Erana/Lady Vaadia\"-Savegame file to start right into the action.


Coming next :

- more hot savegame characters


File history :

- 09/08/2012 initial release


Other mods :

- Seductive Lips HD
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22701

- Realistic Female Face Skin HD
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23447

- Dibellas Temptress gift - Beauties of Skyrim -> the good girl edition
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22190

- Dibellas Lunari Gift - Beauties of Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24560

- Beauties of Skyrim - Eilinel Temptress Vampire Start Savegame
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22063


Author\'s note :

These three adorable ladies are only the starting point of a series of hot savegame characters I plan to release in this file so keep on track if you like my work.

If you enjoy my mod please endorse or leave a comment and/or load up some pics of her. I will really apprechiate it! 

Criticism is also welcome since it can only improve my work. I put a lot of dedication and hours of work into the creation of my characters, so don\'t be too harsh ;-).
author: EcthelionOtW
